fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler

Class TextInputStreamControler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.controler.TextInputStreamControler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TextInputStreamControler
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The TextInputStreamControler is an Observable class that reads the input stream. This class reads the input given and notifies the observer for two behaviours:
    • When the channel address appears in the log
    • When the message "Stream ended" appears
    The observer present in the StreamControler class will handle those changes.
    Author:
    Romain Rousseau

        public void run()
